Posts.Content: katkbm wrote: Hello,   I recently noticed a small purplish bump underneath my left breast..  I have had it there now for over a week and am a little concerned because I saw a news report that indicated that women have noticed these bumps and it was discovered that it was breast cancer. Also about 2 yrs ago when my mother had her mamogram, they found a very small lump and biopsied it.  It turned out to be nothing then, but she was placed on medication because she was informed that in about 10 yrs she may develop breast cancer.  I don't know the specifics because my mother didn't quite understand, and she preferred not to talk about it (we live in different states).  Please can someone give me some information.  Thank you katkbm Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pimple or bump katkbm jalydiju
